basics.name: Stéphane Bisinger
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer with a variety of experiences both on the frontend and backend side of applications. I enjoy working in self-organizing teams who take ownership of the product they develop and work in a collaborative environment.

work.summary: Rentouch develops the piplanning app, which enables SAFe PI planning sessions remotely. It is a whiteboard with stickies that can be synchronized to Jira/Azure DevOps/Rally.
highlights: Introduced several practices to improve quality and speed of development, like a living styleguide, reusable components and maintainable tests.
Improved the security of the application. This includes the creation of Proof-of-Concepts to demonstrate the potential issue.
Helped both business and development side to apply the Pareto principle and release with an incremental approach.
Introduced concepts and tools to improve the observability of the system. This includes error reporting, automatic tracing and collection of metrics.
Technologies used: Python, Javascript/Typescript, Vue.js, Kubernetes, Websockets, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

work.summary: Software Crafter, trainer and coach for 42talents. Focused on frontend development, web performance, serverless architectures and extreme programming.
highlights: Optimized the performance and SEO of the main website.
Developed a Proof-of-Concept for a web shop with Strapi and a static site generator.
Prepared teaching materials and introductions for workshops.
Technologies used: Strapi (nodejs), eleventy (nodejs), middleman (ruby)

work.summary: Homegate is one of the biggest marketplaces for properties and apartments in Switzerland. I was part of the teams reengineering the notification system for new properties and the product display page.
highlights: Guided the team to achieve Continuous Delivery with automated QA, pair programming, fast iterations and complete automation.
Started the journey to observability through tools like Datadog and Sentry.
Solved complex and novel problems like Server-Side Rendering and Code Splitting in a serverless context.
Lead technical decisions in collaboration with the rest of the team.
Held a course on Webpack for the TX Academy.
Technologies used: AWS, nodejs, webpack, Vue.js, NoSQL, Serverless

work.summary: siroop was an online marketplace for Switzerland
highlights: Worked on the streaming data pipeline for product and price updates from merchants.
Rewrote the pipeline to process product categories and support internationalization.
Refactored a Flask API to be able to switch between DynamoDB and Elasticsearch as source for data.
Wrote an alternative entrypoint for product data using RabbitMQ as a source.
Took a leading role in the analysis, planning and implementation of a product promotion.
Technologies used: AWS, nodejs, Python, Django, RabbitMQ, NoSQL, PostgreSQL

work.summary: Renuo is a web agency specialized in Ruby on Rails and Angular. Among my duties and accomplishments are:
highlights: The development of a Ruby on Rails and Angular 2 single page application for a big insurance company.
Taking responsibility for all the servers, reorganizing them and promoting a shift towards a cloud/serverless architecture.
Training interns and junior developers through pair programming, live coding and presentations.
Technologies used: Ruby on Rails, Angular, HTML5, CSS3, PostgreSQL
